title: Inception
plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

cast.name: Leonardo DiCaprio
cast.bio: Leonardo Wilhelm DiCaprio is an American actor and film producer. Known for his work in biopics and period films, he has placed multiple times in annual rankings of the world's highest-paid actors.

cast.name: Joseph Gordon-Levitt
cast.bio: Joseph Leonard Gordon-Levitt is an American actor and filmmaker. He has received various accolades, including nominations for the Golden Globe Award for Best Actor.

cast.name: Ellen Page
cast.bio: Elliot Page is a Canadian actor and producer. He has received various accolades, including an Academy Award nomination, two BAFTA Awards, and Emmy Award nominations.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

cast.name: Tim Robbins
cast.bio: Timothy Francis Robbins is an American actor, filmmaker, and musician. He is known for his roles in films such as Bull Durham, Jacob's Ladder, and The Shawshank Redemption.

cast.name: Morgan Freeman
cast.bio: Morgan Freeman is an American actor, director, and narrator. He is known for his distinctive deep voice and various roles in a wide variety of film genres.

title: The Dark Knight
plot: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

cast.name: Christian Bale
cast.bio: Christian Charles Philip Bale is an English actor. Known for his versatility and physical transformations for his roles, he has been a leading man in films of several genres.

cast.name: Heath Ledger
cast.bio: Heath Andrew Ledger was an Australian actor and music video director. After playing roles in Australian television and film during the 1990s, Ledger moved to the United States in 1998 to develop his film career.

cast.name: Aaron Eckhart
cast.bio: Aaron Edward Eckhart is an American actor. Born in Cupertino, California, Eckhart moved to the United Kingdom at age 13, when his father relocated the family.

title: Pulp Fiction
plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

cast.name: John Travolta
cast.bio: John Joseph Travolta is an American actor and singer. He rose to fame during the 1970s, appearing on the television sitcom Welcome Back, Kotter and starring in the box office successes Carrie, Saturday Night Fever, and Grease.

cast.name: Uma Thurman
cast.bio: Uma Karuna Thurman is an American actress, producer and fashion model. Prolific in film and television productions encompassing a variety of genres, she had her breakthrough in Dangerous Liaisons.

cast.name: Samuel L. Jackson
cast.bio: Samuel Leroy Jackson is an American actor and producer. One of the most widely recognized actors of his generation, the films in which he has appeared have collectively grossed over $27 billion worldwide.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

cast.name: Elijah Wood
cast.bio: Elijah Jordan Wood is an American actor and producer. He is best known for his portrayal of Frodo Baggins in the Lord of the Rings film trilogy and The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey.

cast.name: Viggo Mortensen
cast.bio: Viggo Peter Mortensen Jr. is an American actor, author, musician, photographer, poet, and painter. Born in New York to a Danish father and American mother, he was a resident of Venezuela and Argentina during his childhood.

cast.name: Ian McKellen
cast.bio: Sir Ian Murray McKellen CH CBE is an English actor. With a career spanning six decades, he has performed in genres ranging from Shakespearean and modern theatre to popular fantasy and science fiction.

title: Forrest Gump
plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

cast.name: Tom Hanks
cast.bio: Thomas Jeffrey Hanks is an American actor and filmmaker. Known for both his comedic and dramatic roles, he is one of the most popular and recognizable film stars worldwide, and is regarded as an American cultural icon.

cast.name: Robin Wright
cast.bio: Robin Gayle Wright is an American actress and director. She has won a Golden Globe Award and a Satellite Award, and has received eleven Emmy Award nominations for her work in television.

cast.name: Gary Sinise
cast.bio: Gary Alan Sinise is an American actor, director, musician, producer and philanthropist. Among other awards, he has won an Emmy Award, a Golden Globe Award, a star on Hollywood Walk of Fame and has been nominated for an Academy Award.

title: The Matrix
plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

cast.name: Keanu Reeves
cast.bio: Keanu Charles Reeves is a Canadian actor. Born in Beirut and raised in Toronto, Reeves began acting in theatre productions and in television films before making his feature film debut in Youngblood.

cast.name: Laurence Fishburne
cast.bio: Laurence John Fishburne III is an American actor, playwright, producer, screenwriter, and film director. He is known for playing Morpheus in The Matrix trilogy.

cast.name: Carrie-Anne Moss
cast.bio: Carrie-Anne Moss is a Canadian actress. Following early roles on television, she rose to international prominence for her role of Trinity in The Matrix series.

title: Goodfellas
plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

cast.name: Robert De Niro
cast.bio: Robert Anthony De Niro Jr. is an American actor, producer, and director. He is particularly known for his nine collaborations with filmmaker Martin Scorsese, and is the recipient of various accolades.

cast.name: Ray Liotta
cast.bio: Raymond Allen Liotta was an American actor and producer. He was known for playing Henry Hill in the Martin Scorsese film Goodfellas, as well as for starring in Field of Dreams, among many other roles.

cast.name: Joe Pesci
cast.bio: Joseph Frank Pesci is an American actor and musician. He is known for portraying tough, volatile characters in a variety of genres and for his collaborations with Robert De Niro and Martin Scorsese.

title: Interstellar
plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

cast.name: Matthew McConaughey
cast.bio: Matthew David McConaughey is an American actor and producer. He had his breakout role with a supporting performance in the coming-of-age comedy Dazed and Confused.

cast.name: Anne Hathaway
cast.bio: Anne Jacqueline Hathaway is an American actress. The recipient of various accolades, including an Academy Award, a Golden Globe Award, and a Primetime Emmy Award.

cast.name: Jessica Chastain
cast.bio: Jessica Michelle Chastain is an American actress and producer. Known for her roles in films with feminist themes, she has received various accolades, including an Academy Award and a Golden Globe Award.

title: Fight Club
plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

cast.name: Brad Pitt
cast.bio: William Bradley Pitt is an American actor and film producer. He is the recipient of various accolades, including two Academy Awards, a British Academy Film Award, two Golden Globe Awards.

cast.name: Edward Norton
cast.bio: Edward Harrison Norton is an American actor and filmmaker. He has received numerous awards and nominations, including a Golden Globe Award and three Academy Award nominations.

cast.name: Helena Bonham Carter
cast.bio: Helena Bonham Carter CBE is an English actress. She is known for her work in independent films and blockbusters, particularly period dramas, and often collaborates with her former partner, filmmaker Tim Burton.

title: Spirited Away
plot: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

cast.name: Daveigh Chase
cast.bio: Daveigh Elizabeth Chase is an American actress, singer, and voice actress, best known for her roles as Samara Morgan in The Ring and Lilo Pelekai in the Lilo & Stitch franchise.

cast.name: Suzanne Pleshette
cast.bio: Suzanne Pleshette was an American actress and voice actress. Pleshette started her career in the theatre and began appearing in films in the late 1950s.

title: The Prestige
plot: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

cast.name: Christian Bale
cast.bio: Christian Charles Philip Bale is an English actor. Known for his versatility and physical transformations for his roles, he has been a leading man in films of several genres.

cast.name: Hugh Jackman
cast.bio: Hugh Michael Jackman is an Australian actor. Beginning in theatre and television, he landed his breakthrough role as James "Logan" Howlett / Wolverine in the X-Men film series.

cast.name: Scarlett Johansson
cast.bio: Scarlett Ingrid Johansson is an American actress. She was the world's highest-paid actress in 2018 and 2019, and has featured multiple times on the Forbes Celebrity 100 list.
